S

setConnectionOptions(Map<String, String>) - Method in interface com.leucine.storage.StorageProvider
StorageService reads StorageProvider.conf, the first line of which represents a StorageProvider in the classpath, the next lines are fed to the storage provider with com.leuicine.storage.StorageProvider#setConnectionOptions
setId(String) - Method in class com.leucine.storage.SPEntity
 
SPDirectory - Class in com.leucine.storage
Implementation of directory in the storage provider.
SPDirectory() - Constructor for class com.leucine.storage.SPDirectory
 
SPDirectory(String) - Constructor for class com.leucine.storage.SPDirectory
 
SPEntity - Class in com.leucine.storage
Represents an entity (File or Directory) that implement entities in the storage provider.

SPFile - Class in com.leucine.storage
Implementation of your file in the storage service.
SPFile() - Constructor for class com.leucine.storage.SPFile
 
SPFile(String) - Constructor for class com.leucine.storage.SPFile
 
StorageProvider - Interface in com.leucine.storage
Implement this interface to provide custom classes that represent entities the storage service (that extend SPFile and SPDirectory, and StringToEntityMapper).
StorageService - Class in com.leucine.storage
 
StringToEntityMapper - Interface in com.leucine.storage
Implement this interface to map your version of SPFile or SPDirectory from path names such as "/tmp/File.txt"
